title: Meager Creek - Lower
whats_it_like: A glacial read and run blitz underneath one of Canada's most unstable volcanoes.
scouting_portaging: The whole run can be scouted from the hike in.

time.original: 2 hour hike in, 30 minute paddle out

when_to_go: Summer (June-Sept). Can probably scrape down at other times of year.
